en.name: AK-74 wooden upper handguard
en.description: A standard Izhmash-produced wooden handguard for AK-74 assault rifles. Upper portion only.

en.name: AK-74 polymer upper handguard
en.description: A polymer handguard for AK-74 automatic rifles which replaced the classic wooden one. Manufactured by Izhmash.

en.name: AK Zenit B-10 lower Handguard
en.description: The integrally machined B-10 foregrip is manufactured from aluminum alloy D16T with black coating and can be installed instead of the standard-issue foregrip on an AK. It's fitted with Picatinny rail mounts on two sides, allowing for the installation of additional equipment such as tactical foregrips, flashlights, and laser designators. Manufactured by Zenit.

en.name: AK Zenit B21L lower handguard
en.description: "B-21L handguard" rail is milled product made of aluminum alloy D16T coated. Designed for Vityaz SN, Saiga-9, TR9 Raradox and rifles based on them.

en.name: Zenit sports long rail section (bottom)
en.description: A section of rail for attaching accessories

en.name: AK Zenit B-22 rear sight rail mount
en.description: B-22 rear sight rail is a milled product made of aluminum D16T with black coating.

en.name: Zenit sports long rail section (side)
en.description: A section of rail for attaching accessories

en.name: AK Zenit RL-1 hand stop
en.description: The "RL-1" grip is designed for  the convenience of holding weapons, mounted on the Basis rail, is fastened with one screw included in the kit.

en.name: AK Vezhlivyy Strelok VS-29 handguard (For Vityaz)
en.description: The VS-29 handguard produced by Vezhlivyy Strelok for the Saiga 9 carbine.

en.name: AK Vezhlivyy Strelok VS-29 handguard (for Saiga-9)
en.description: The VS-29 handguard produced by Vezhlivyy Strelok for the Saiga 9 carbine.

en.name: AK Zenit Sport 3 upper handguard
en.description: "Sport-3" kit is installed in place of the regular handguard of Saiga-9 or TR9 Paradox. All products of the kit are milled with a coating of black color.

en.name: AK Zenit Sport 3 forward lower handguard
en.description: The lower forward section of the Sport 3 handguard, produced by Zenitco.

en.name: AK Zenit B-9M forward rail mount
en.description: Lower forward rail mount B-9M produced by Zenitco for attachment to their picatinny handguards.

en.name: AK SAG MK3 Chassis System (BLK)
en.description: The MK3 Chassis allows the use of factory Iron Sights when installed and allows for maintenance of the firearm without disturbing your optic set up. Fits all standard stamped AKM with standard length gas system. Precision Machined from 6061 T6 Aluminum.

en.name: AK SAG MK3 Chassis System (GRN)
en.description: The MK3 Chassis allows the use of factory Iron Sights when installed and allows for maintenance of the firearm without disturbing your optic set up. Fits all standard stamped AKM with standard length gas system. Precision Machined from 6061 T6 Aluminum.

en.name: AK SAG MK3 Chassis System (GRY)
en.description: The MK3 Chassis allows the use of factory Iron Sights when installed and allows for maintenance of the firearm without disturbing your optic set up. Fits all standard stamped AKM with standard length gas system. Precision Machined from 6061 T6 Aluminum.

en.name: AK SAG MK3 Chassis System (Plum)
en.description: The MK3 Chassis allows the use of factory Iron Sights when installed and allows for maintenance of the firearm without disturbing your optic set up. Fits all standard stamped AKM with standard length gas system. Precision Machined from 6061 T6 Aluminum.

en.name: AK SAG MK3 Chassis System (Tan)
en.description: The MK3 Chassis allows the use of factory Iron Sights when installed and allows for maintenance of the firearm without disturbing your optic set up. Fits all standard stamped AKM with standard length gas system. Precision Machined from 6061 T6 Aluminum.

en.name: WASR-10/63 "Sharkfin" style wooden foregrip
en.description: A modified version of the Romanian Wasr 10 wooden foregrip in a sharkfin style. Slightly more ergonomic and pleasing to the eye.
